Author: DevYukine
Name: Snowfall
Punchline: Let your materia fall like snow. A streamlined utility for mass extraction and more.
Description:
Snowfall
Let your materia fall like snow.

Tired of clicking "Begin" and "Yes" every time you need to clear out gear? Snowfall adds a simple Retrieve All Materia button to your right-click menu.

Once clicked, the plugin takes over: it opens the retrieval window, confirms the prompts, and loops until your item is empty. Itâ€™s fast, reliable, and keeps the menu-mashing to a minimum.
